snippet.title: Modi Government Launches Cash Prize Scheme to Promote Digital Payments

localized.description:
Demonetisation: Government launches cash prize scheme to promote digital payments. Under the lucky grahak yojana scheme, 15000 winners will be awarded daily for 100 days, starting from December 25, with Rs 1000 each. The scheme will also see a weekly draw for seven winners with a maximum award of one crore.
